column4: Well i was a windows user for a very long time. Now the only reason i log in windows is to play leisure suit larry and that because i was too lazy :-) to see if it works in cedega!
:) cool, the switch isn't always easy, sometimes it is, welcome :)
the switch wasn't easy for me either until i installed Ubuntu. Like i said i tried many distros but now Ubuntu rulez my pc!!! :-)
yeah, i switched during sarge, i settled onto debian my self
